articles.title: How algae learned to harness the Sun without getting burned
articles.description: Under the sea, green algae have evolved a clever way to handle too much sunlight. articles.title: HILL, THOMPSON: Taxpayers should know how much their municipal governments spend
articles.description: In rural areas, fewer people share the cost of roads, parks and emergency services. But high spending isn’t inevitable. Some rural municipalities managed to spend far less, demonstrating local choices about what services to provide, and how to deliver them, matter.
